title: Telephone exchange
creator_credit: David Cons, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
brief_description: Shows by diagrams, models and live action the basic working of an automatic telephone exchange. Comparisons with a manual exchange. Demonstrates working of a uniselector, dialling a number and the subsequent connection. Shows correct method of dialling.
creator_credit_for_label: David Cons, Denis Ward and Technical and Scientific Films
